name: Laravel
description: Powerfull and have much library also supported by communinty

name: Echo Framework
description: Well documentation and most of requirement of building web application is provided on this framework

name: NodeJS
description: Easy to use and suppport async

name: Golang
description: Fast and structured, but need time to be expert

name: Graphql
description: Strong type, auto generate api document and client can filter what will used

name: Elasticsearch
description: Goof for complex search also good on performannce

name: MongoDB
description: Easy to use but not good in readable data and traditional relational data

name: Redis
description: Easy to use for caching, high impact less effort to improve performance

name: AWS
description: Well documentation and easy implemented (ex: golang)

name: Docker
description: All backend application wrapped by docker images

name: Codeigniter
description: Support, documentation and community less than laravel

name: Unleash
description: Easy way for using feature flag

name: MySQL
description: Simple to use and use it if not complex relational database

name: API Gateway
description: API Gateway for guard our services
